# Intro

Hello, my name is Thomas Cavallone, and I am currently a freshman at the University of Delaware studying Accounting and Business Analytics at the Alfred Lerner College of Business & Economics. I am from Chatham, New Jersey and went to Chatham High School. I plan on getting a CFA and am open to internships in any field of business to learn more.


# I Like

- Finance
- Business Analytics
- Lifeguarding and promoting safety
- Learning new skills
- Community involvement
